___name.description: The name of the container service in the specified subscription and resource group.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
Properties of the container service.

___orchestratorProfile.description: Profile for the container service orchestrator.

___linuxProfile.description: Profile for Linux VMs in the container service cluster.

___windowsProfile.description: Profile for Windows VMs in the container service cluster.

___masterProfile.description: Profile for the container service master.

_88ContainerServiceAgentPoolProfile.description: Profile for the container service agent pool.

___name.description: Unique name of the agent pool profile in the context of the subscription and resource group.

___dnsPrefix.description: DNS prefix to be used to create the FQDN for the agent pool.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___count.description: Number of agents (VMs) to host docker containers. Allowed values must be in the range of 1 to 100 (inclusive). The default value is 1.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___enabled.description: Whether the VM diagnostic agent is provisioned on the VM.

___vmDiagnostics.description: Profile for diagnostics on the container service VMs.

_88ContainerServiceOrchestratorProfile.description: Profile for the container service orchestrator.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___orchestratorType.description: The orchestrator to use to manage container service cluster resources. Valid values are Swarm, DCOS, and Custom.

_88ContainerServiceVMDiagnostics.description: Profile for diagnostics on the container service VMs.

_88ContainerServiceSshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux-based VMs running on Azure.

$eref.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key data.

___keyData.description: Certificate public key used to authenticate with VMs through SSH. The certificate must be in PEM format with or without headers.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___publicKeys.description: the list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with Linux-based VMs.
